Rice___Leaf_blast.symptoms: Spindle-shaped spots with ashy gray centers and brown borders on leaves.
Rice___Leaf_blast.pesticide: Spray Tricyclazole 75 WP @ 0.6 g/liter or Carbendazim 50 WP @ 1 g/liter of water.
Rice___Leaf_blast.organic: Desi Recipe: Mix 10 liters of 10-day-old sour buttermilk (Khatti Chhash) with 100 liters of water. Spray during early morning.
Rice___Leaf_blast.hindi_pest: ट्राइसाइक्लाज़ोल 75 WP @ 0.6 ग्राम/लीटर या कार्बेन्डाजिम 50 WP @ 1 ग्राम/लीटर का छिड़काव करें।

Wheat___Brown_rust.symptoms: Small, round, orange-to-brown pustules appearing randomly on the leaf surface.
Wheat___Brown_rust.pesticide: Apply Propiconazole (Tilt 25 EC) @ 1 ml/liter or Tebucanazole @ 1.5 ml/liter.
Wheat___Brown_rust.organic: Desi Recipe: 5% Neem Seed Kernel Extract (NSKE). Boil 5kg neem kernels in water, filter, and dilute to 100 liters.
Wheat___Brown_rust.hindi_pest: प्रोपिकोनाज़ोल (Tilt 25 EC) @ 1 मिली/लीटर या टेबुकोनाज़ोल @ 1.5 मिली/लीटर का प्रयोग करें।

Sugarcane___Red_rot.symptoms: Reddish lesions on the midrib; internal cane tissue turns red with white transverse bands.
Sugarcane___Red_rot.pesticide: Drench soil with Carbendazim @ 1g/liter. Note: Primarily managed via set-treatment before planting.
Sugarcane___Red_rot.organic: Desi Recipe: Soil application of Trichoderma viride mixed with 50kg well-rotted Farm Yard Manure (FYM).
Sugarcane___Red_rot.hindi_pest: कार्बेन्डाजिम @ 1 ग्राम/लीटर के साथ मिट्टी का उपचार करें।
Sugarcane___Red_rot.dosage_per_acre: Apply FYM mixture at the base of stalks.
